item.title: 中国习近平三年来首次访问金融中心上海
item.description:
China's President Xi Jinping visited Shanghai, where he went to several venues and learned about the city's efforts to strengthen its competitiveness as an international financial center, Xinhua news agency reported on Wednesday.翻译:据新华社周三报道，中国国家主席习近平访问上海，参观了多个场馆，了解上海为增强国际金融中心竞争力所做的努力。

Xi made the trip on Tuesday and Wednesday and he inspected the Shanghai Futures Exchange, an exhibition on Shanghai's sci-tech innovations, and a government-subsidized rental housing community, the report said.翻译:报道称，习近平周二和周三出访，考察了上海期货交易所、上海科技创新展览和政府补贴租赁住房社区。

He was seen with other government leaders, including senior communist party official Cai Qi, Vice Premier He Lifeng and Shanghai's party secretary Chen Jining.翻译:人们看到他与其他政府领导人在一起，包括中共高级官员蔡奇、国务院副总理何立峰和上海市委书记陈吉宁。

It was his first visit to the city since November 2020 and comes a year after historic street protests against China's zero-COVID policy broke out in Shanghai.翻译:这是他自 2020 年 11 月以来首次访问这座城市，一年前，上海爆发了针对中国零新冠政策的历史性街头抗议活动。

The visit also coincides with the 10th anniversary of the establishment of the Shanghai Free-Trade Zone (FTZ), a testing ground for economic reforms but which has struggled to live up to is initial promise of free-flowing currency and easier international trade.翻译:此次访问也恰逢上海自由贸易区（FTZ）成立十周年。上海自由贸易区是经济改革的试验场，但一直难以兑现货币自由流动和国际贸易便利化的最初承诺。

Shanghai is home to China's largest foreign business community, hosting firms such as Tesla (TSLA.O), Disney (DIS.N) and L'Oreal, but its economy and global reputation was badly hit by a two-month-long COVID-induced lockdown last year.翻译:上海是中国最大的外国商业社区的所在地，拥有特斯拉(TSLA.O) 、迪士尼(DIS.N)和欧莱雅等公司，但其经济和全球声誉受到了长达两个月的新冠疫情的严重打击。去年引发的封锁。

Xi's visit also comes as confidence among foreign businesses and private investors in the Chinese economy remains subdued, hurt by the country's past COVID policies and a years-long regulatory crackdown on sectors from technology to property that the government begun easing this year.翻译:习近平此次访问之际，外国企业和私人投资者对中国经济的信心仍然低迷，原因是中国过去的新冠疫情政策以及政府今年开始放松的对技术和房地产等行业长达数年的监管打压。

Overtures by Chinese Premier Li Qiang, a close Xi confidant, to both foreign firms and local entrepreneurs over the past year where he has declared the country open for business has been greeted with scepticism in light of a broader anti-espionage law, and moves such as raids on consultancies, as well as a lack of policies to boost confidence.翻译:过去一年里，习近平的亲密密友、中国总理李强向外国公司和当地企业家提出的建议，他宣布中国开放商业，但鉴于更广泛的反间谍法，他受到了质疑，并采取了诸如此类的举措。对咨询机构的突击搜查，以及缺乏提振信心的政策。

Reporting by Beijing Newsroom; Editing by Mark Potter, Louise Heavens and Chizu Nomiyama翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；编辑：Mark Potter、Louise Heavens 和 Chizu Nomiyama

item.title: 美元从三个月低点回升；通胀降温欧元下跌
item.description:
The U.S. dollar rose slightly on Wednesday after falling to its lowest in more than three months on hopes that the Federal Reserve will soon cut rates, while the euro slipped as data showed European inflation cooled in November.翻译:由于市场预期美联储将很快降息，美元周三小幅上涨，此前跌至三个多月以来的最低点，而欧元则因数据显示11月份欧洲通胀降温而下滑。

Comments from Fed official Christopher Waller flagging a possible rate cut in the months ahead sent U.S. bond yields and the dollar sliding on Tuesday.翻译:美联储官员克里斯托弗·沃勒(Christopher Waller)表示未来几个月可能降息的言论导致美国债券收益率和美元周二下滑。

"(Waller's) relatively hawkish, historically speaking, so if his attitude is turning a little bit more dovish, it sort of says that perhaps a general consensus of the board members is that rates have peaked and maybe could even be cut next year," said Kyle Rodda, senior financial market analyst at Capital.com.翻译:“从历史上看，（沃勒）相对鹰派，所以如果他的态度变得更加鸽派，这有点表明董事会成员的普遍共识是利率已经见顶，甚至可能明年下调。” Capital.com 高级金融市场分析师凯尔·罗达 (Kyle Rodda) 表示。

The dollar index , which tracks the currency against six peers, hit its lowest since early August at 102.46 in the Asian trading session.翻译:跟踪美元兑六种货币的美元指数在亚洲交易时段触及 8 月初以来的最低点 102.46。

It then bounced somewhat and was last up 0.18% at 102.8. The dollar was on track to fall 3.7% in November, its biggest monthly drop in a year.翻译:随后有所反弹，最后上涨0.18%至102.8。 11 月份美元有望下跌 3.7%，创一年来最大单月跌幅。

"Essentially it's come off the back of the U.S. and global bond rally, in particular with the U.S. 10-year (Treasury note)," said Alvin Tan, head of Asia FX strategy at RBC Capital Markets.翻译:加拿大皇家银行资本市场亚洲外汇策略主管Alvin Tan表示：“本质上，这是美国和全球债券上涨的结果，特别是美国10年期国债（国债）。”

The U.S. 10-year Treasury yield dropped 5 basis points (bps) on Tuesday and was down by the same amount again on Wednesday to 4.2898%, its lowest since mid-September.翻译:美国10年期国债收益率周二下跌5个基点，周三再次下跌相同幅度至4.2898%，为9月中旬以来的最低水平。

Yields move inversely to prices, and lower bond yields make fixed income investments in a country look less attractive relative to peers, weighing on the local currency.翻译:收益率与价格成反比，而较低的债券收益率使得一个国家的固定收益投资相对于其他国家而言吸引力较低，从而对当地货币造成压力。

The euro briefly crossed $1.10 for the first time since August on Tuesday but pared gains and was last down 0.1% at $1.0984.翻译:周二，欧元兑美元自8月以来首次短暂突破1.10美元，但随后回吐涨幅，最终下跌0.1%至1.0984美元。

Inflation data from Germany, Europe's biggest economy, showed that price growth slowed to 2.3% year-on-year in November from 3% in October. Inflation in Spain also slowed sharply.翻译:欧洲最大经济体德国的通胀数据显示，11月份物价同比增速从10月份的3%放缓至2.3%。 西班牙的通胀也大幅放缓。

"On an intraday basis (the euro) has come off the high... but of course on the flip side U.S. bond yields are continuing to grind lower," said Tan. "There are two contrasting forces at play here."翻译:“盘中来看（欧元）已经脱离高点……但当然，另一方面，美国债券收益率正在继续走低，”谭说。 “这里有两种截然不同的力量在发挥作用。”

The euro zone-wide inflation figure is due out on Thursday, before the Fed's preferred measure of U.S. inflation, the personal consumption expenditures index, or PCE.翻译:欧元区整体通胀数据将于周四公布，先于美联储首选的美国通胀指标个人消费支出指数（PCE）公布。

New Zealand's dollar was last up 0.34% to $0.6157, after the Reserve Bank of New Zealand on Wednesday held interest rates but warned that further policy tightening might be needed.翻译:新西兰联储周三维持利率不变，但警告可能需要进一步收紧政策后，新西兰元最后上涨 0.34% 至 0.6157 美元。

The kiwi had surged more than 1% earlier in the session to a four-month high of $0.6207.翻译:新西兰元当天早些时候飙升逾 1%，至四个月高点 0.6207 美元。

Japan's yen , which is particularly sensitive to U.S. bond yields, held on to recent gains on Wednesday. The dollar up 0.1% at 147.55 after earlier falling to a more-than-two-month low of 146.68 yen.翻译:对美国债券收益率特别敏感的日元周三维持了近期涨幅。美元兑日元上涨0.1%，至147.55，此前美元兑日元曾跌至两个多月低点146.68。

China's onshore yuan finished the domestic session at 7.1246 per dollar, the strongest closing price since June 16.翻译:中国在岸人民币国内交易时段收于每美元7.1246，为6月16日以来的最高收盘价。

Reporting by Harry Robertson in London and Rae Wee in Singapore; Editing by Bernadette Baum and Alexander Smith翻译:Harry Robertson 在伦敦和 Rae Wee 在新加坡的报道；伯纳黛特·鲍姆和亚历山大·史密斯编辑

item.title: 台湾任命资深外交官为新任美国特使
item.description:
Taiwan on Wednesday appointed a veteran diplomat as its new de facto ambassador to the United States, Taipei's highest-profile global posting despite a lack of formal diplomatic ties, after the previous ambassador quit to run for vice president.翻译:台湾周三任命一名资深外交官为其新的事实上的驻美国大使，这是在前任大使辞职竞选副总统后，尽管缺乏正式外交关系，台湾在全球范围内担任的最高职位。

Hsiao Bi-khim, well-connected in Washington, resigned from the job as U.S. envoy this month to be the running mate for current Vice President Lai Ching-te in Taiwan's Jan. 13 presidential election. President Tsai Ing-wen cannot run again after two terms in office.翻译:在华盛顿人脉广泛的萧美琴本月辞去了美国特使的职务，在1月13日的台湾总统选举中成为现任副总统赖清德的竞选搭档。蔡英文总统连任两届后不能再次参选。

The presidential office said it had appointed Alexander Yui, Taiwan's representative to the European Union, to replace Hsiao.翻译:青瓦台表示，已任命台湾驻欧盟代表余伟雄接替萧。

The United States is Taiwan's most important international backer and arms supplier even though Washington does not formally recognise its government, maintaining official relations only with Beijing which claims the island as its own territory.翻译:美国是台湾最重要的国际支持者和武器供应商，尽管华盛顿并未正式承认台湾政府，仅与北京保持官方关系，北京声称台湾拥有自己的领土。

Tsai "hopes to use Ambassador Yui's rich cross-regional diplomatic experience to help promote the continuous deepening of Taiwan-U.S. relations on the existing solid foundation", the presidential office said.翻译:总统府表示，蔡英文希望利用余大使丰富的跨地区外交经验，协助推动台美关系在现有坚实基础上不断深化。

The government only approved the EU appointment of the trilingual Yui, who also speaks fluent Spanish, in June.翻译:政府于六月才批准了欧盟对能说流利西班牙语的三语者 Yui 的任命。

Yui is a former deputy foreign minister and previously ran Taiwan's office in Geneva.翻译:唯是前外交部副部长，此前曾负责台湾驻日内瓦办事处。

The statement used the title "ambassador" though it is not formally used, given neither the United States nor EU have official relations with Taiwan.翻译:该声明使用了“大使”的头衔，但由于美国和欧盟都没有与台湾建立正式关系，因此并未正式使用该头衔。

Yui's spot in Brussels will be filled by deputy foreign minister Roy Lee, the presidential office said, a rising diplomatic star in Taiwan's foreign service who received his doctorate from the Australian National University in Canberra.翻译:总统办公室表示，余伊在布鲁塞尔的职位将由外交部副部长李罗伊(Roy Lee)填补，李罗伊是台湾外交界冉冉升起的外交新星，在堪培拉的澳大利亚国立大学获得博士学位。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Bernadette Baum翻译:本·布兰查德报道；编辑：Jacqueline Wong 和 Bernadette Baum

item.title: 斯里兰卡与债权国就债务重组原则达成一致
item.description:
Summary:
  • Sri Lanka says deal covers about $5.9 bln of public debt
  • Deal will help Sri Lanka secure further IMF bailout funds
  • Agreement hailed as milestone in debt restructuring efforts
翻译:概括：
  • 斯里兰卡称协议涵盖约59亿美元的公共债务
  • 协议将帮助斯里兰卡获得更多国际货币基金组织救助资金
  • 协议被誉为债务重组努力的里程碑

Sri Lanka and a group of its creditor nations said on Wednesday they have reached an agreement in principle on debt restructuring, a key step needed for the South Asian nation to emerge from its severe economic crunch.翻译:斯里兰卡及其一些债权国周三表示，他们已就债务重组原则上达成协议，这是这个南亚国家摆脱严重经济危机所需的关键一步。

The deal will help Sri Lanka clear the first review of a bailout under the International Monetary Fund (IMF) executive board program by the year end, which would trigger a second IMF tranche of about $334 million.翻译:该协议将帮助斯里兰卡在年底前通过国际货币基金组织(IMF)执行董事会计划下的首次救助审查，这将引发国际货币基金组织第二笔约3.34亿美元的援助。

"This agreement serves as a key milestone in Sri Lanka's ongoing endeavour to achieve public debt sustainability and to foster economic recovery," said Sri Lanka's treasury secretary Mahinda Siriwardana.翻译:斯里兰卡财政部长马欣达·斯里瓦达纳 (Mahinda Siriwardana) 表示：“该协议是斯里兰卡持续努力实现公共债务可持续性和促进经济复苏的一个重要里程碑。”

The small island nation, mired in its worst financial crisis in decades, has been trying to reach restructuring deals with creditors since last year after defaulting on its foreign debt in May 2022 due to record-low foreign exchange reserves.翻译:这个深陷几十年来最严重金融危机的小岛国，因外汇储备创历史新低而于2022年5月出现外债违约，自去年以来一直试图与债权人达成重组协议。

Sri Lanka's finance ministry said the agreement in principle covered approximately $5.9 billion of outstanding public debt and consisted of a mix of long-term maturity extension and reduction in interest rates.翻译:斯里兰卡财政部表示，该协议原则上涵盖约59亿美元的未偿公共债务，包括长期期限延长和利率降低。

Japan co-chairs Sri Lanka's official creditor committee, together with France and India, which is comprised of 15 nations. China, which has already struck a deal with the island nation, is Sri Lanka's largest bilateral creditor and has not joined this group as a formal member.翻译:日本与法国和印度共同担任斯里兰卡官方债权人委员会的主席，该委员会由 15 个国家组成。中国已与斯里兰卡达成协议，是斯里兰卡最大的双边债权人，但尚未作为正式成员加入该组织。

"I expect this case will be applied as a leading case in dealing with debt problems in middle income nations," said Japan's top financial diplomat, Masato Kanda, describing the agreement as a "major achievement".翻译:日本最高金融外交官神田正人表示，“我预计此案将成为解决中等收入国家债务问题的领先案例”，并将该协议描述为“重大成就”。

The Paris Club of creditor nations, which includes Japan, said the agreement could be formalised in the coming weeks.翻译:包括日本在内的债权国巴黎俱乐部表示，该协议可能会在未来几周内正式确定。

According to data from Sri Lanka's finance ministry, its external debt was $36.6 billion at the end of June this year. Once the debt restructuring is completed, Sri Lanka hopes to reduce its overall debt by $16.9 billion.

RESTRUCTURING MILESTONE

"This is a key milestone for debt restructuring," said Udeeshan Jonas, chief strategist at equity research firm CAL Group.翻译:股票研究公司 CAL Group 首席策略师 Udeeshan Jonas 表示：“这是债务重组的一个重要里程碑。”

"The good news is that this activates the second IMF tranche and that also means ADB (Asian Development Bank) and other funding comes into place helping the government's borrowing requirements to come down."翻译:“好消息是，这启动了国际货币基金组织的第二笔付款，也意味着亚行（亚洲开发银行）和其他资金到位，帮助政府降低借贷需求。”

"The next step will be for Sri Lanka to negotiate a deal with the sovereign bondholders," Jonas added.翻译:“斯里兰卡下一步将与主权债券持有人谈判达成协议，”乔纳斯补充道。

Sri Lanka's overseas bonds extended gains after the debt agreement was officially confirmed, with longer-dated notes rising as much as 1.6 cents on the dollar to just over 50 cents at 1213 GMT time, according to Tradeweb data.翻译:根据 Tradeweb 的数据，在债务协议正式确认后，斯里兰卡的海外债券扩大了涨幅，较长期债券兑美元汇率上涨了 1.6 美分，截至格林尼治时间 1213 年略高于 50 美分。

Sri Lanka's finance ministry said it would next focus on striking similar deals with other bilateral creditors for debt amounting to $274 million.翻译:斯里兰卡财政部表示，下一步将重点与其他双边债权人就总额为 2.74 亿美元的债务达成类似协议。

It will also try to reach agreement with bondholders who hold the bulk of the island nation's $12.5 billion worth of international sovereign bonds.翻译:它还将努力与持有该岛国价值125亿美元国际主权债券大部分的债券持有人达成协议。

The debt restructuring proposal sent by private creditors in October did not receive a favourable response from Sri Lanka's finance ministry, which said it had "serious reservations" about the construct of proposed macro-linked bonds.翻译:私人债权人十月份提出的债务重组提案并未得到斯里兰卡财政部的积极回应，该部表示对拟议的宏观挂钩债券的构建持“严重保留”。

Kanda said negotiations were "on track" with bilateral creditors and they were working on details of a memorandum of understanding. He declined to comment on details such as the interest rates that would be applied to the restructured debt, or the repayment period.翻译:神田表示，与双边债权人的谈判“步入正轨”，他们正在研究谅解备忘录的细节。他拒绝就重组债务适用的利率或还款期限等细节发表评论。

The IMF did not immediately respond to request for comment.翻译:国际货币基金组织没有立即回应置评请求。

"These engagements will ensure that the overall debt treatment granted to Sri Lanka is consistent with the IMF program parameters," the official creditor committee said in a statement.翻译:官方债权人委员会在一份声明中表示：“这些接触将确保给予斯里兰卡的总体债务处理符合国际货币基金组织的计划参数。”

The agreement with the group of creditor nations comes about a month after the island nation reached a deal with the Export-Import Bank of China covering about $4.2 billion of outstanding debt.翻译:与债权国集团达成协议大约一个月前，该岛国与中国进出口银行达成协议，涵盖约 42 亿美元的未偿债务。

"As far as the information we have is concerned, conditions set by China are comparable to ours," Kanda said.翻译:神田说：“就我们掌握的信息而言，中国设定的条件与我们的条件相当。”

Reporting by Tetsushi Kajimoto in Tokyo and Uditha Jayasinghe in Colombo, additional reporting by Jorgelina do Rosario; writing by Sudipto Ganguly; Editing by Chang-Ran Kim, Miral Fahmy, Bernadette Baum and Christina Fincher翻译:Tetsushi Kajimoto 在东京和 Uditha Jayasinghe 在科伦坡的报道，Jorgelina do Rosario 的补充报道；苏迪普托·甘古利 (Sudipto Ganguly) 撰写；编辑：Chang-Ran Kim、Miral Fahmy、Bernadette Baum 和 Christina Fincher

item.title: 债券沐浴在美联储降息的讨论中
item.description:
Summary:
  • Two-year Treasury yields hit 4-month low
  • Euro zone sovereign bond yields fall
  • Euro STOXX 600 adds 0.4%, German shares lead
  • Dollar slides broadly; Gold hits 7-month high
  • Global stocks up almost 9% in November
翻译:概括：
  • 两年期国债收益率创4个月新低
  • 欧元区主权债券收益率下跌
  • 欧洲斯托克 600 指数上涨 0.4%，德国股市领涨
  • 美元全面下滑；金价创7个月新高
  • 11 月份全球股市上涨近 9%

Treasury yields and the dollar hit multi-month lows on Wednesday after a U.S. Federal Reserve official made fresh hints of interest rate cuts, while stocks gained ground on hopes of easing inflation.翻译:在美联储官员再次暗示降息后，美国国债收益率和美元周三触及数月低点，而股市则因通胀缓解的希望而上涨。

Fed funds futures rallied on the remarks to price in more than hundred basis points (bps) of cuts in 2024 and a 40% chance they begin as soon as March. Two-year Treasury yields fell sharply and touched fresh lows in the Asia session.翻译:联邦基金期货因上述言论而上涨，预计 2024 年降息幅度将超过 100 个基点 (bps)，并且降息最快于 3 月份开始的可能性为 40%。两年期国债收益率大幅下跌，并在亚洲时段触及新低。

The two-year yield hit its lowest since mid-July at 4.69% and the benchmark 10-year yield fell 6 bps to its lowest since September at 4.28%.翻译:两年期国债收益率触及7月中旬以来的最低点4.69%，基准10年期国债收益率下跌6个基点，降至9月以来的最低点4.28%。

Euro zone sovereign bond yields also fell and markets increased bets on rate cuts after data from North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany's most populous state, supported expectations for a drop in German inflation.翻译:德国人口最多的州北莱茵-威斯特法伦州的数据支持了德国通胀下降的预期，欧元区主权债券收益率也下跌，市场加大了降息押注。

The dollar index , which tracks the currency against six peers, hit its lowest since early August at 102.46.翻译:追踪美元兑六种货币的美元指数触及 8 月初以来的最低点 102.46。

The dollar fell 0.2% at 147.70 yen , having earlier traded at its lowest since mid-September. It touched a 3-1/2 month low at $1.1017 per euro .翻译:美元兑日元下跌0.2%，至147.70日元，早些时候曾触及9月中旬以来的最低点。触及 3-1/2 个月低点每欧元 1.1017 美元。

Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller - an influential and previously hawkish voice at the U.S. central bank - told the American Enterprise Institute on Tuesday that rate cuts could begin in a matter of months, provided inflation keeps easing.翻译:美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒（Christopher Waller）周二对美国企业研究所表示，如果通胀持续缓和，美联储可能会在几个月内开始降息。

Waller's remark echoed earlier comments made by Fed Chair Jerome Powell.翻译:沃勒的言论呼应了美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔早些时候的言论。

"The U.S. remarks are instantly priced in," said Robert Alster, chief investment officer at Close Brothers Asset Management, adding that central banks in major economies across the world were starting to deliver "varying remarks" on inflation.翻译:Close Brothers Asset Management首席投资官罗伯特·阿尔斯特(Robert Alster)表示，“美国的言论立即被消化”。他补充说，全球主要经济体的央行开始对通胀发表“不同的言论”。

"The U.S. is dovish, the UK is neutral or on the fence, and the Europeans are to some extent quite hawkish."翻译:“美国是鸽派，英国是中立或持观望态度，欧洲人在某种程度上相当鹰派。”

European stocks(.STOXX) added 0.4%, with German shares (.GDAXI) rising 1% to touch a four-month high on the North Rhine-Westphalia data.翻译:欧洲股市(.STOXX)上涨 0.4%，德国股市(.GDAXI)上涨 1%，因北莱茵-威斯特法伦州数据而触及四个月高点。

The MSCI world equity index (.MIWD00000PUS), which tracks shares in 47 countries, was flat and on track for a gain of about 9% this month, which would be its best in three years.翻译:追踪 47 个国家股票的 MSCI 世界股票指数(.MIWD00000PUS)持平，本月有望上涨约 9%，这将是三年来的最佳表现。

Wall Street shares were set to open up 0.3% .翻译:华尔街股市开盘上涨 0.3%。

Earlier, MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) fell 0.2% on weakness in Hong Kong tech shares.翻译:早些时候，由于香港科技股走软，摩根士丹利资本国际 (MSCI) 日本以外亚太地区最广泛股票指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)下跌 0.2%。

Currencies including sterling and the Australian dollar, as well as a host of Asian emerging market currencies, also made fresh multi-month peaks on the dollar.翻译:包括英镑和澳元在内的货币以及许多亚洲新兴市场货币也创下了美元的数月新高。

The New Zealand dollar was last up 0.3%, having blown past resistance to top 62 U.S. cents and make a four-month high. New Zealand's central bank on Wednesday slightly lifted its interest rate projections and warned hikes may not be over.翻译:纽元最后上涨 0.3%，突破阻力位至 62 美分上方，创四个月新高。新西兰央行周三小幅上调利率预测，并警告加息可能尚未结束。

Australian inflation eased by more than expected.

'CONDITIONALITY'

Waller's remarks extended what has been a two-week rally in stocks and bonds around the world since a benign U.S. inflation report two weeks ago -- except in China, where doubts about the economy and a deepening property crisis have investors downbeat.翻译:沃勒的言论延续了自两周前美国通胀报告发布以来全球股市和债券已连续两周上涨的势头，但中国除外，对经济的疑虑和不断加深的房地产危机令投资者感到悲观。

"Surprisingly explicit," was how analysts at Deutsche Bank described the comments. "That was taken as another sign that the Fed were done hiking rates," they added in a note to clients.翻译:德意志银行分析师这样描述这些评论：“直白得令人惊讶”。他们在给客户的一份报告中补充道：“这被视为美联储已完成加息的另一个迹象。”

Some analysts are wary that markets have run with parts of Fed officials' remarks -- flagging possible rate cuts -- even though the comments have been conditional on further declines in inflation and on financial conditions staying restrictive.翻译:一些分析师对市场跟随美联储官员的部分言论（暗示可能降息）持谨慎态度，尽管这些言论的条件是通胀进一步下降和金融状况保持限制性。

"Bets ought to be guided by conditionality that policy is appropriately tight, not indulged with abandon on over-confidence that Fed is done," said Mizuho economist Vishnu Varathan.翻译:瑞穗经济学家 Vishnu Varathan 表示，“押注应该以政策适度紧缩为条件，而不是因对美联储已经完成任务的过度自信而放纵。”

Elsewhere, gold shot to a seven-month high above $2,501 an ounce.翻译:其他方面，金价升至每盎司 2,501 美元以上，创七个月高点。

"Gold has confirmed its shift into a new range," Rhona O'Connell, head of market analysis at StoneX, wrote in a note to clients, adding that it "now needs to correct and stabilise."翻译:StoneX 市场分析主管罗娜·奥康奈尔 (Rhona O'Connell) 在给客户的一份报告中写道：“金价已确认进入新的区间。”她补充说，金价“现在需要修正和稳定”。

Brent crude futures climbed 1.4% to $82.78 a barrel ahead of a crucial OPEC+ meeting on Thursday to decide output policy in the next months, but prices were set for a monthly drop.翻译:在周四举行关键的 OPEC+ 会议以决定未来几个月的产量政策之前，布伦特原油期货上涨 1.4% 至每桶 82.78 美元，但价格预计每月下跌。

Reporting by Tom Wilson in London and Tom Westbrook in Singapore; Editing by Miral Fahmy and Bernadette Baum翻译:汤姆·威尔逊 (Tom Wilson) 在伦敦和汤姆·威斯布鲁克 (Tom Westbrook) 在新加坡的报道；编辑：Miral Fahmy 和 Bernadette Baum

item.title: 独家：华为新智能汽车公司在高级股权谈判中估值高达350亿美元
item.description:
Huawei Technologies' (HWT.UL) new smart car software and components firm is set for a valuation of up to 250 billion yuan ($34.67 billion) after it sells stakes to investors including Changan Auto, three people with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:三名知情人士表示，华为技术有限公司 (HWT.UL) 的新智能汽车软件和零部件公司在向长安汽车等投资者出售股份后，估值将高达 2500 亿元人民币（346.7 亿美元）。

The Chinese company said on Sunday it will spin off its four-year-old Intelligent Automotive Solution (IAS) business unit - which aimed to become the equivalent of German automotive supplier Bosch of the intelligent electric vehicle (EV) era - into a new company which will receive the unit's core technologies and resources.翻译:这家中国公司周日表示，将把成立四年的智能汽车解决方案（IAS）业务部门分拆为一家新公司，该部门旨在成为智能电动汽车（EV）时代的德国汽车供应商博世（Bosch）。它将获得该单位的核心技术和资源。

Main auto partner Chongqing Changan Automobile (000625.SZ) and relevant parties will own up to 40% of the new firm, a Changan Auto statement showed on Sunday. Neither Changan Auto nor Huawei disclosed financial details.翻译:长安汽车周日发布声明称，主要汽车合作伙伴重庆长安汽车（000625.SZ）及相关方将持有新公司最多40%的股份。长安汽车和华为均未透露财务细节。

Changan Auto and its ultimate parent, state-owned China Ordnance Equipment Group - also known as China South Industries Group - are considering acquiring about 35% and 5% respectively of the new firm, which could be valued at 200 billion to 250 billion yuan, two of the people said.翻译:长安汽车及其最终母公司、国有的中国兵器装备集团（又称中国兵器装备集团）正在考虑分别收购新公司约35%和5%的股份，估值可能达到2000亿至2500亿元人民币。两个人说道。

Potential minority shareholders include state-owned automakers FAW Group (SASACJ.UL) and Dongfeng Motor Group (0489.HK), which are also in advanced talks with Huawei to acquire up to 5% each, said the three people.翻译:三名知情人士表示，潜在的少数股东包括国有汽车制造商一汽集团(SASACJ.UL)和东风汽车集团(0489.HK) ，它们也在与华为进行深入谈判，以分别收购最多5%的股份。

Huawei will likely remain the single largest shareholder with 40% to 50% for at least the next two-to-three years, said two of the people.翻译:两位知情人士表示，至少在未来两到三年内，华为可能仍将保持 40% 至 50% 的单一最大股东地位。

Deal details - notably the ownership split and valuation - have not been finalised and are subject to change, the three people said. The transaction will also be subject to regulatory approval, said one of the people as well as a fourth person with knowledge of the matter.翻译:三人表示，交易细节——尤其是所有权分割和估值——尚未最终确定，并且可能会发生变化。一位知情人士和第四位知情人士表示，该交易还将获得监管部门的批准。

The people declined to be identified as the matter is private.翻译:由于此事属于私事，知情人士拒绝透露姓名。

Changan Auto referred Reuters to its Sunday statement and declined to comment further.翻译:长安汽车向路透社提及其周日的声明，但拒绝进一步置评。

Huawei confirmed it is in advanced talks to sell part of its new smart car firm to a number of investors including Chongqing Changan Automobile, but did not comment on the valuation.翻译:华为证实，正在就向包括重庆长安汽车在内的多家投资者出售其新智能汽车公司的部分股份进行深入谈判，但未对估值发表评论。

It added that it wanted to move technologies and resources into a new company to work with partners to promote innovation in smart car technology and promote the development of the automotive industry. It did not comment further.翻译:该公司还表示，希望将技术和资源转移到新公司，与合作伙伴共同推动智能汽车技术创新，推动汽车行业发展。它没有进一步发表评论。

The other companies involved did not immediately respond to requests for comment.翻译:其他相关公司没有立即回应置评请求。

The spin-off is rare for Huawei whose businesses including telecommunications and consumer electronics have been owned by founder Ren Zhengfei and close to 100,000 shareholding employees since the firm's 1987 founding. In 2020, a year after it was subjected to U.S. sanctions on security grounds, it sold budget smartphone brand Honor to keep the brand alive.翻译:此次分拆对于华为来说是罕见的，自1987年成立以来，华为的电信和消费电子等业务一直由创始人任正非和近10万名持股员工拥有。 2020年，也就是该公司因安全原因受到美国制裁一年后，该公司出售了廉价智能手机品牌荣耀，以维持该品牌的活力。

Three of the people said one reason for the planned sale is that Huawei has struggled to grow the smart car business and needs to recoup capital to cover research and development (R&D) spending.翻译:三名知情人士表示，计划出售的原因之一是华为一直在努力发展智能汽车业务，需要收回资金来支付研发（R&D）支出。

Huawei senior executives including Ren initially pinned high hopes on the unit to be a new growth driver, said the people.翻译:知情人士称，任正非等华为高管最初对该部门寄予厚望，希望该部门成为新的增长动力。

It has invested $3 billion in the unit since its inception and grown its R&D team to 7,000 people, showed the company's 2022 annual report.翻译:该公司2022年年报显示，自该部门成立以来，该公司已向该部门投资30亿美元，并将研发团队扩大到7000人。

Ren did not respond to a Reuters query via the company.翻译:任正非没有通过该公司回应路透社的询问。

But it was the only money-losing unit among Huawei's main six and brought in one billion yuan revenue in the first half of 2023, a fraction of the company's 310.9 billion yuan total, Huawei said in August.翻译:但华为在 8 月份表示，它是华为六大业务中唯一亏损的部门，2023 年上半年实现收入 10 亿元人民币，仅占该公司 3109 亿元人民币总收入的一小部分。

Huawei has partnerships with other auto companies, including Seres Group (601127.SS) and Jianghuai Automobile (600418.SS), as well as with Changan Auto involving EV brands Avatr and Deepal.翻译:华为与其他汽车公司建立了合作伙伴关系，包括塞雷斯集团（601127.SS）和江淮汽车（600418.SS） ，以及涉及电动汽车品牌Avatr和Deepal的长安汽车。

The new firm - which Huawei has said will engage in R&D, production, sales and service of intelligent automotive systems and component solutions - will also absorb the group's other auto-related assets and resources outside the IAS business unit, said one of the three people.翻译:其中一位人士表示，华为表示，新公司将从事智能汽车系统和零部件解决方案的研发、生产、销售和服务，还将吸收该集团在IAS业务部门之外的其他汽车相关资产和资源。 。

Huawei is considering locating the new firm's headquarters in Chongqing, a sprawling southwestern municipality where Changan is based, said two of the people. The unit is currently headquartered in Shanghai.翻译:两位知情人士表示，华为正在考虑将新公司总部设在重庆，这是一个庞大的西南直辖市，也是长安汽车的总部所在地。该单位目前总部位于上海。

The proposed deal will also smooth the way for the business' listing, as Huawei had planned, said two of the people.翻译:两位知情人士表示，拟议中的交易还将为华为原计划的上市铺平道路。

Richard Yu, head of Huawei's consumer business and who has overseen the smart car unit for years, is unlikely to lead the new firm, one of the people said without elaborating.翻译:一位知情人士表示，华为消费者业务负责人、多年来负责智能汽车部门的余承东不太可能领导这家新公司，但没有详细说明。

($1 = 7.2111 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2111 人民币）

Reporting by Julie Zhu and Zhuzhu Cui; Additional reporting by David Kirton; Editing by Brenda Goh and Christopher Cushing翻译:朱莉朱、崔朱朱报道；大卫·科顿 (David Kirton) 的补充报道；布伦达·吴和克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: 沃尔玛从中国转向印度以获得更便宜的进口产品
item.description:
Summary:
  • Walmart imports more from India, reducing reliance on China
  • 60% of shipments came from China in Jan-Aug 2023 vs 80% in 2018
  • India is key component of Walmart's supply chain, Walmart says
翻译:概括：
  • 沃尔玛从印度进口更多产品，减少对中国的依赖
  • 2023 年 1 月至 8 月，60% 的出货量来自中国，而 2018 年为 80%
  • 沃尔玛表示，印度是沃尔玛供应链的关键组成部分

Walmart (WMT.N) is importing more goods to the United States from India and reducing its reliance upon China as it looks to cut costs and diversify its supply chain, data seen by Reuters shows.翻译:路透社看到的数据显示，沃尔玛（WMT.N）正在从印度进口更多商品到美国，并减少对中国的依赖，以降低成本并实现供应链多元化。

The world's largest retailer shipped one quarter of its U.S. imports from India between January and August this year, according to bill of lading figures shared with Reuters by data firm Import Yeti. That compared with just 2% in 2018.翻译:根据数据公司 Import Yeti 向路透社分享的提单数据，今年 1 月至 8 月期间，这家全球最大的零售商从印度发货了四分之一的美国进口商品。相比之下，2018 年这一数字仅为 2%。

Only 60% of its shipments came from China during the same period, down from 80% in 2018, the same data shows. To be sure, China is still Walmart's biggest country for importing goods.翻译:同一数据显示，同期其出货量中只有 60% 来自中国，低于 2018 年的 80%。可以肯定的是，中国仍然是沃尔玛最大的商品进口国家。

The shift illustrates how the rising cost of importing from China and escalating political tensions between Washington and Beijing are encouraging large U.S. companies to import more from countries including India, Thailand and Vietnam.翻译:这一转变表明，从中国进口的成本上升以及华盛顿和北京之间不断升级的政治紧张局势如何鼓励美国大公司从印度、泰国和越南等国家进口更多产品。

"We want the best prices," Andrea Albright, Walmart's executive vice president of sourcing said in an interview. "That means I need resiliency in our supply chains. I can't be reliant on any one supplier or geography for my product because we're constantly managing things from hurricanes and earthquakes to shortages in raw materials."翻译:“我们想要最优惠的价格，”沃尔玛负责采购的执行副总裁安德里亚·奥尔布赖特(Andrea Albright)在接受采访时表示。 “这意味着我的供应链需要有弹性。我的产品不能依赖任何一家供应商或任何地理位置，因为我们不断应对从飓风、地震到原材料短缺等各种问题。”

In a statement, Walmart said the bill of lading data painted a partial picture of what it sourced and that creating redundancy "does not necessarily mean" it was reducing reliance on any of its sourcing markets. "We're a growth business and are working to source more manufacturing capacity," Walmart said.翻译:沃尔玛在一份声明中表示，提货单数据描绘了其采购情况的部分情况，创造冗余“并不一定意味着”它正在减少对其任何采购市场的依赖。沃尔玛表示：“我们是一家成长型企业，正在努力寻找更多的制造能力。”

India has emerged as a key component of Walmart's efforts to build that manufacturing capacity, Albright said.翻译:奥尔布赖特表示，印度已成为沃尔玛建设制造能力的重要组成部分。

Walmart has been accelerating growth in India since 2018, when it bought a 77% stake in Indian e-commerce firm Flipkart. Two years later, it committed to import $10 billion of goods from India each year by 2027. That is a target it remains on track to hit, Albright said. It is currently importing around $3 billion worth of goods from India each year.

WORKFORCE, TECHNOLOGY ARE KEY DRAWS

Walmart is importing goods ranging from toys and electronics to bicycles and pharmaceuticals from India to the U.S., Albright said. Packaged food, dry grains and pasta are also popular imports from India, she added.翻译:奥尔布赖特说，沃尔玛正在从印度向美国进口玩具、电子产品、自行车和药品等商品。她补充说，包装食品、干谷物和面食也是从印度进口的热门产品。

India, whose stock market has risen to record highs this year, is viewed as the country best equipped to outperform China in low-cost, large-scale manufacturing.翻译:印度股市今年已升至历史新高，被视为最有能力在低成本、大规模制造业方面超越中国的国家。

Its rapidly growing workforce and technological advancement were a draw for Walmart, Albright said. China on the other hand reported its first decline in population in six decades last year.翻译:奥尔布赖特表示，其快速增长的劳动力和技术进步对沃尔玛具有吸引力。另一方面，中国去年报告了人口六十年来的首次下降。

Walmart started its sourcing operations in Bangalore in 2002. Now, the company employs more than 100,000 people, including temporary workers, in the country spread across several offices under its Walmart Global Tech India unit, Flipkart Group, PhonePe and sourcing operations.翻译:沃尔玛于 2002 年在班加罗尔开始开展采购业务。现在，该公司在印度拥有超过 10 万名员工，其中包括临时工，分布在沃尔玛全球科技印度子公司、Flipkart Group、PhonePe 和采购业务下的多个办事处。

Walmart CEO Doug McMillon met Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi in May this year, a meeting that Modi termed "a fruitful one."翻译:沃尔玛首席执行官道格·麦克米伦(Doug McMillon)今年5月会见了印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪(Narendra Modi)，莫迪称这次会晤“富有成果”。

"Happy to see India emerge as an attractive destination for investment," Modi wrote on X, formerly known as Twitter, on May 14. McMillon said Walmart would "continue to support the country's manufacturing growth and create opportunity."翻译:5 月 14 日，莫迪在 X（前身为 Twitter）上写道：“很高兴看到印度成为有吸引力的投资目的地。”麦克米伦表示，沃尔玛将“继续支持该国制造业增长并创造机会”。

Walmart rival Amazon (AMZN.O) said this month it is targeting merchandise exports worth $20 billion from India by 2025.翻译:沃尔玛竞争对手亚马逊(AMZN.O)本月表示，其目标是到 2025 年从印度出口价值200 亿美元的商品。

Freewill Sports, a small Indian supplier of soccer balls, is one company that has benefited, its Chief Executive Rajesh Kharabanda said in an interview.翻译:印度小型足球供应商 Freewill Sports 首席执行官拉杰什·卡拉班达 (Rajesh Kharabanda) 在接受采访时表示，该公司是受益者之一。

The rising cost of shipping goods from China has also contributed to the switch to India, supply chain experts say.翻译:供应链专家表示，从中国运输货物的成本不断上升也是导致转向印度的原因之一。

"Sourcing from mainland China has become less competitive because of rising labor costs versus other manufacturing centers," said Chris Rogers, research analyst at S&P Global Market Intelligence's supply chain analysis group Panjiva.翻译:标准普尔全球市场财智旗下供应链分析集团磐聚网的研究分析师克里斯·罗杰斯表示：“由于与其他制造中心相比，劳动力成本不断上升，从中国大陆采购的竞争力已经下降。”

China's minimum wage changes from province to province and sometimes even from city to city, with a range between 1,420 yuan per month and 2,690 yuan per month ($198.52 - $376.08). Meanwhile, average wages for unskilled and semi-skilled workers in India range from about 9,000 Indian rupees to 15,000 Indian rupees a month ($108.04 - $180.06), according to central bank estimates.

SUPPLY CHAIN SNAGS

The COVID-19 pandemic exposed weaknesses in global supply chains, showing U.S. importers to be over-reliant on a small number of markets.翻译:COVID-19 大流行暴露了全球供应链的弱点，表明美国进口商过度依赖少数市场。

"Planning for a geopolitical event is like planning for a hurricane," said Albright. "What I can control is where my product is coming from and how do I make sure that Christmas still happens if something happens in our supply chain."翻译:奥尔布赖特说：“为地缘政治事件做准备就像为飓风做准备一样。” “我能控制的是我的产品来自哪里，以及如果我们的供应链发生问题，我如何确保圣诞节仍然会发生。”

Pakistan and Bangladesh have also benefited from Walmart's strategy, expanding as suppliers of home and apparel products, Albright said.翻译:奥尔布赖特说，巴基斯坦和孟加拉国也受益于沃尔玛的战略，扩大了家居和服装产品供应商的规模。

Last year, at least eight Freewill shipments sailed to Walmart warehouses from Mundra Port in Gujarat, the largest private port in India, according to U.S. import data.翻译:根据美国进口数据，去年，至少有八批 Freewill 货物从印度最大的私人港口古吉拉特邦蒙德拉港运往沃尔玛仓库。

"There is a newfound confidence in the Indian manufacturing industry and also the availability of factory infrastructure," Freewill's Chief Executive Rajesh Kharabanda said in an interview.翻译:Freewill 首席执行官 Rajesh Kharabanda 在接受采访时表示：“人们对印度制造业以及工厂基础设施的可用性有了新的信心。”

India's central bank forecasts that the country's economy will expand 6.5% this fiscal year. China is expected to grow around 5% this year.翻译:印度央行预测本财年该国经济将增长6.5%。中国今年预计增长5%左右。

"In the last 12 to 18 months there has certainly been a bigger impact," said Shekhar Gupta, whose family business Devgiri has been selling floor rugs to Walmart for about a decade. "That's when Walmart started putting a true strategy behind how they wanted India at the center of their growth."翻译:“在过去 12 到 18 个月里，肯定产生了更大的影响，”谢卡尔·古普塔 (Shekhar Gupta) 说，他的家族企业 Devgiri 向沃尔玛销售地毯已有大约十年的时间。 “从那时起，沃尔玛开始制定真正的战略，支持他们希望印度成为其增长的中心。”

item.title: 全球经济增长放缓但避免硬着陆——OECD
item.description:
The global economy will slow slightly next year but the risk of a hard landing has subsided despite high levels of debt and uncertainty over interest rates, the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development said on Wednesday.翻译:经济合作与发展组织周三表示，尽管债务水平较高且利率存在不确定性，全球经济明年将略有放缓，但硬着陆的风险已经消退。

Global growth is set to moderate from 2.9% this year to 2.7% in 2024 before picking up in 2025 to 3.0%, the Paris-based policy forum said in its latest Economic Outlook.翻译:总部位于巴黎的政策论坛在其最新的经济展望中表示，全球经济增长预计将从今年的 2.9% 放缓至 2024 年的 2.7%，然后在 2025 年回升至 3.0%。

Growth in advanced economies that make up the OECD's 38 members was seen headed for a soft landing, with the United States holding up better than expected so far.翻译:经合组织 38 个成员国的发达经济体的增长预计将实现软着陆，其中美国的表现迄今为止好于预期。

"Our central projections are for a soft landing, but that cannot be taken for granted," OECD chief economist Clare Lombardelli told a news conference.翻译:经合组织首席经济学家克莱尔·隆巴德利在新闻发布会上表示：“我们的核心预测是软着陆，但这不能视为理所当然。”

"Monetary policy needs careful calibration to bring inflation to targets while minimising the impact on growth. These judgements are now harder than earlier in the cycle and the risks of policy errors are greater," she added.翻译:“货币政策需要仔细调整，以使通胀达到目标，同时尽量减少对增长的影响。现在的判断比周期早期更难，政策错误的风险也更大，”她补充道。

The OECD forecast U.S. growth would slow from 2.4% this year to 1.5% next year, revising up its estimates from September when it predicted U.S. growth of 2.2% in 2023 and 1.3% in 2024.翻译:经合组织预测美国经济增速将从今年的 2.4% 放缓至明年的 1.5%，高于 9 月份的预期，当时预测美国 2023 年经济增速为 2.2%，2024 年为 1.3%。

Though the risk of a hard landing in the United States and elsewhere had eased, the OECD said that the risk of recession was not off the table given weak housing markets, high oil prices and sluggish lending.翻译:尽管美国和其他地区硬着陆的风险有所缓解，但经合组织表示，鉴于房地产市场疲软、油价高企和贷款疲软，经济衰退风险并未排除。

China's economy was also expected to slow as it grapples with a deflating real estate bubble and consumers save more in the face of greater uncertainty about the outlook.翻译:预计中国经济也将放缓，因为中国正在努力应对房地产泡沫破灭的问题，而且消费者在面临更大的前景不确定性时会增加储蓄。

Its growth was seen easing from 5.2% this year to 4.7% in 2024 - both marginally higher than expected in September - before slowing further in 2025 to 4.2%, the OECD forecast.翻译:经合组织预测，其增长率预计将从今年的 5.2% 放缓至 2024 年的 4.7%，均略高于 9 月份的预期，然后在 2025 年进一步放缓至 4.2%。

In the euro area, growth was seen picking up from 0.6% this year to 0.9% in 2024 and 1.1% in 2025 as Germany - the region's largest economy - emerged from a recession this year.翻译:在欧元区，随着该地区最大经济体德国今年摆脱衰退，预计增长将从今年的 0.6% 升至 2024 年的 0.9% 和 2025 年的 1.1%。

Nonetheless, the OECD warned that, because of the high level of bank financing in the euro zone, the full impact of interest rate hikes remained uncertain and could weigh more on growth than expected.翻译:尽管如此，经合组织警告称，由于欧元区银行融资水平较高，加息的全面影响仍不确定，对经济增长的影响可能超出预期。

Meanwhile, Japan, the only major advanced economy yet to hike interest rates in the current cycle, was expected to see growth slow from 1.7% this year to 1.0% in 2024 before picking up to 1.2% in 2024.翻译:与此同时，日本是当前周期中唯一尚未加息的主要发达经济体，预计其经济增速将从今年的 1.7% 放缓至 2024 年的 1.0%，然后在 2024 年回升至 1.2%。

While countries' growth outlooks were diverging, they shared similar fiscal pressures, with debt burdens projected to keep rising for years to come in G7 countries, the OECD warned.翻译:经合组织警告说，虽然各国的增长前景存在分歧，但它们面临着相似的财政压力，预计七国集团国家的债务负担将在未来几年持续上升。

"Governments need to act to prevent unsustainable debt paths. Needed reforms include medium-term plans to curb deficits over time, reducing the cost of ageing and to preserve spending that is effective and efficient," Lombardelli said.翻译:“各国政府需要采取行动，防止不可持续的债务路径。所需的改革包括中期计划，以随着时间的推移遏制赤字，降低老龄化成本，并保持有效和高效的支出，”隆巴德利说。

Reporting by Leigh Thomas; Editing by Christina Fincher and Catherine Evans翻译:利·托马斯报道；克里斯蒂娜·芬奇和凯瑟琳·埃文斯编辑

item.title: 早间出价：沃勒到华尔街，美联储转牌
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

As Wall Street mourns the passing of 99-year-old investment legend Charlie Munger, Federal Reserve top brass gave one of the clearest signals yet that the central bank's 20-month tightening campaign is over at last.翻译:当华尔街哀悼 99 岁的投资传奇人物查理·芒格 (Charlie Munger)去世时， 美联储高层发出了迄今为止最明确的信号之一，即央行长达 20 个月的紧缩行动终于结束了。

The death of Berkshire Hathaway's Munger leaves 93-year Warren Buffett without his long-term lieutenant and the conglomerate's lone star name, focusing minds on long-planned succession and the lesser-known managers due to take over.翻译:伯克希尔哈撒韦公司创始人芒格的去世，让93岁的沃伦·巴菲特失去了他的长期副手，也失去了该集团唯一的明星名字，人们的注意力集中在长期计划的继任者和即将接任的不太知名的经理人身上。

But back in the markets, the Fed's policy pivot was all the rage as Treasury yields and dollar plunged anew.翻译:但回到市场，随着美国国债收益率和美元再次暴跌， 美联储的政策转向风靡一时。

Fed Governor Christopher Waller, a hawkish and influential voice at the central bank and seen to be close in thinking to Fed boss Jerome Powell, clearly indicated the Fed's swingeing rate hiking was over as current settings bear down on inflation.翻译:美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒(Christopher Waller)是美联储的强硬派和有影响力的声音，被认为与美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔(Jerome Powell)的想法接近，他明确表示，由于当前环境对通胀构成压力，美联储的大幅加息已经结束。

"I am increasingly confident that policy is currently well positioned to slow the economy and get inflation back to 2%," he said, and also "reasonably confident" of doing so without a sharp rise in the unemployment rate, now at 3.9%.翻译:他表示：“我越来越有信心，目前的政策能够很好地减缓经济增长，让通胀率回到2%。”并且“相当有信心”在失业率不会急剧上升（目前为3.9%）的情况下实现这一目标。

And in later comments interpreted as signalling rate cuts could be considered next year, Waller said there was "no reason" to insist rates stay "really high" if inflation continues to decline consistently.翻译:沃勒在随后的评论中表示，如果通胀继续持续下降，“没有理由”坚持利率保持“非常高”，这被解释为明年可能考虑降息。

Other Fed officials chimed with Waller. New York Fed chief John Williams said long-term inflation expectations were anchored, reassuring and "remarkably stable".翻译:其他美联储官员也赞同沃勒的观点。纽约联储行长约翰·威廉姆斯表示，长期通胀预期得到锚定、令人安心且“非常稳定”。

Chicago Fed President Austan Goolsbee was more colorful in insisting there were risks in keeping rates too high for too long - due to the lags in policy taking effect.翻译:芝加哥联储行长奥斯坦·古尔斯比(Austan Goolsbee)则更加丰富多彩地坚称，由于政策生效的滞后性，长期将利率维持在过高水平存在风险。

"Anybody who cooks a turkey knows that you got to pull it out of the oven before it's to the point where you want it to be, because it's going to have residual heat."翻译:“任何煮过火鸡的人都知道，在火鸡达到你想要的温度之前，你必须把它从烤箱里拿出来，因为它会有余热。”

Only Fed governor Michelle Bowman seemed to hold up the side of the hawks, saying she still expects one more rate rise.翻译:只有美联储理事米歇尔·鲍曼似乎站在鹰派一边，表示她仍然预计会再次加息。

Has there been a deliberate shift in guidance? We may have to wait for Powell for the casting vote on that when he speaks on Friday.翻译:是否有故意改变指导方针？我们可能不得不等待鲍威尔周五发表讲话时对此进行决定性投票。

But for now, markets were electrified by Waller's seeming turn and the prospect that their bullish take on stocks and bonds for 2024 - disinflation, rate cuts and a soft landing - looked to be on track.翻译:但就目前而言，沃勒的态度似乎出现了转变，而且他们对 2024 年股票和债券的乐观看法——通货紧缩、降息和软着陆——似乎已步入正轨，这让市场感到兴奋。

Fed futures now have the first Fed rate cut of a quarter point fully priced for May and 110bps of rate cuts by year-end.翻译:美联储期货目前已完全定价 5 月份美联储首次降息 25 个基点，并在年底降息 110 个基点。

Two-year Treasury yields plunged more than 15 basis points to four-month lows of 4.66% on Wednesday, with 10-year yields hitting their lowest since mid-September - a startling drop of more than 75bps in little over a month.翻译:周三，两年期国债收益率暴跌逾 15 个基点，至 4.66% 的四个月低点，其中 10 年期国债收益率触及 9 月中旬以来的最低水平，在一个多月的时间内惊人下跌超过 75 个基点。

The dollar index (.DXY) plunged to 3-month lows, only clawing some of that ground back on Wednesday.翻译:美元指数（.DXY）跌至三个月低点，周三才收复部分失地。

China's offshore yuan , for example, hit its strongest level against the U.S. currency since June.翻译:例如，中国离岸人民币兑美元汇率创下六月以来的最高水平。

Stocks were lifted too, although the reaction has been more muted than in the bond market so far and the (.SPX) only eked out a small gain on Wednesday. Still, November's 8.6% rise makes it the best month of a year that's clocking year-to-date gains of almost 19% and stock futures were up were up smartly again ahead of Wednesday's bell.翻译:股市也有所上涨，尽管迄今为止的反应比债券市场更为温和，并且周三(.SPX)仅小幅上涨。尽管如此，11 月 8.6% 的涨幅使其成为一年中最好的一个月，今年迄今的涨幅接近 19%，股票期货在周三开盘前再次大幅上涨。

The VIX volatility gauge (.VIX) remained close to its lowest since the pandemic at just 12.6.翻译:VIX 波动率指标(.VIX)仍接近大流行以来的最低水平，仅为 12.6。

Crude oil prices were a touch higher ahead of Thursday's OPEC+ meeting, which is still going ahead despite some reports of another postponement amid rifts in the cartel.翻译:在周四的欧佩克+会议之前，原油价格小幅走高，尽管有报道称由于欧佩克内部存在分歧，会议再次推迟，但会议仍在进行。

Most world markets were higher too, with MSCI's all-country stock index (.MIWD00000PUS) firmer and on course for its best month since late 2020 - as November comes to a close tomorrow.翻译:大多数世界市场也走高，MSCI 全国股票指数(.MIWD00000PUS)走强，并有望创下 2020 年底以来最好的一个月 - 明天 11 月即将结束。

The big exception once again were still deeply underperforming China stocks (.CSI300) - now lagging the MSCI global index by almost 25% for 2023. Hong Kong's Hang Seng (.HSI) plunged another 2% as food delivery giant Meituan's (3690.HK) cautious fourth-quarter outlook raised recovery concerns over China's consumer spending.翻译:最大的例外是中国股市(.CSI300)的表现仍然严重落后——目前到 2023 年落后 MSCI 全球指数近 25%。随着食品配送巨头美团点评(3690.HK ) 的推出，香港恒生指数(.HSI)又暴跌 2%。 ）谨慎的第四季度前景引发了对中国消费支出复苏的担忧。

In Europe, November inflation data was awaited - but there were gnawing concerns about the region's real estate companies as Austria's Signa Holdings said it would apply to launch self-administrated insolvency proceedings with a Vienna court on Wednesday.翻译:在欧洲，11 月份通胀数据正在等待，但该地区的房地产公司引发了担忧，因为奥地利的 Signa Holdings 表示将在周三向维也纳法院申请启动自行管理的破产程序。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Tuesday:翻译:周二晚些时候将为美国市场提供更多方向的关键事态发展：

* U.S. Q3 GDP revision, deflator, corporate profits and PCE inflation gauge estimates. U.S. Oct trade balance, retail and wholesale inventories翻译:* 美国第三季度GDP修正、平减指数、企业利润和PCE通胀指标预估。美国10月贸易差额、零售和批发库存

* Federal Reserve releases Beige Book of current economic conditions. Richmond Fed President Thomas Barkin and Cleveland Fed chief Loretta Mester speak. Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey and BoE markets head Andrew Hauser speak at London FX event翻译:* 美联储发布当前经济状况褐皮书。里士满联储主席托马斯·巴尔金和克利夫兰联储主席洛雷塔·梅斯特发表讲话。英国央行行长安德鲁·贝利和英国央行市场主管安德鲁·豪瑟在伦敦外汇活动上发表讲话

* US Secretary of State Blinken meets Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov on sidelines of OSCE meeting in North Macedonia翻译:* 美国国务卿布林肯在北马其顿举行的欧安组织会议期间会见了俄罗斯外交部长谢尔盖·拉夫罗夫

* U.S. corporate earnings: Salesforce, Synopsys, Dollar Tree, Hormel Foods, Intuit, Petco, Bilibili etc翻译:* 美国企业财报：Salesforce、Synopsys、Dollar Tree、Hormel Foods、Intuit、Petco、Bilibili 等

item.title: 第三季离港居民提取退休金按年增1.7%
item.description:
Residents leaving Hong Kong for good withdrew a total of HK$2.213 billion ($283.72 million) from their Mandatory Provident Fund (MPF) pension accounts in the third quarter of 2023, up 1.7% from a year earlier, government data showed.翻译:政府数据显示，2023年第三季度，永久离开香港的居民从强制性公积金(MPF)养老金账户中提取的资金总额为22.13亿港元(合2.8372亿美元)，同比增长1.7%。

A total of 8,700 claims were made in the July-September quarter, compared with the 8,600 claims taking out HK$2.177 billion during the same period in 2022, data from the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority (MPFA) showed on Wednesday.翻译:强制性公积金计划管理局（积金局）周三公布的数据显示，7月至9月季度共提出8,700宗申索，而2022年同期为8,600宗，涉及金额达21.77亿港元。

The number of claims was higher than the 7,300 for the April-June quarter and 6,700 claims in January-March that saw withdrawals of a respective HK$1.787 billion and HK$1.573 billion.翻译:索偿人数较四月至六月季度的 7,300 宗及一月至三月的 6,700 宗为高，提取金额分别为 17.87 亿港元及 15.73 亿港元。

Curbs to control the spread of COVID-19 were among the reasons for people leaving Hong Kong, which tracked China's strict zero-COVID-19 policy closely but began easing restrictions in August last year.翻译:控制 COVID-19 传播的限制措施是人们离开香港的原因之一，香港密切关注中国严格的零 COVID-19 政策，但从去年 8 月开始放松限制。

The MPF is a compulsory retirement scheme for Hong Kong residents, with employees and their employers required to make contributions.翻译:强积金是香港居民的强制性退休计划，雇员及其雇主均须缴款。

Border checkpoints were reopened fully in February while all pandemic curbs were lifted from March 1 and authorities have been trying to restore business confidence and lure investors after more than three years of severe COVID-19 measures.翻译:边境检查站于 2 月全面重新开放，而所有大流行限制措施从 3 月 1 日起取消，当局在实施了三年多的严格的 COVID-19 措施后一直在努力恢复商业信心并吸引投资者。

The city's population increased by 152,000, or 2.1%, from the middle of last year, to 7,498,100 in June this year, marking the first significant uptick since a downward trend began in 2020 due to stringent COVID-19 measures.翻译:今年 6 月，该市人口比去年年中增加了152,000 人，即 2.1%，达到 7,498,100 人，这是自 2020 年因严格的 COVID-19 措施而开始下降趋势以来的首次显着上升。

The Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority said multiple claims for pension withdrawals are sometimes made by a single person as a scheme member may have more than one account.翻译:强制性公积金计划管理局表示，由于一名计划成员可能拥有多个账户，有时一人会提出多次提取退休金的申请。

In the third quarter of 2023, the total number of claims - spanning all reasons including retirement - was 68,500, an increase of 18.9% from the previous quarter's 57,600 claims.翻译:2023 年第三季度，涵盖包括退休在内的所有原因的索赔总数为 68,500 起，比上一季度的 57,600 起索赔增加了 18.9%。

($1 = 7.7999 Hong Kong dollars)翻译:(1 美元 = 7.7999 港元)

item.title: 汇丰银行首席执行官表示，该行已为中国房地产进一步损失做好准备
item.description:
HSBC (HSBA.L) is well provisioned against further China real estate losses, its CEO Noel Quinn said on Wednesday, amid a slump for the country's property market that has led to bank writedowns in recent quarterly earnings.翻译:汇丰银行(HSBA.L)首席执行官诺埃尔·奎恩 (Noel Quinn) 周三表示，由于中国房地产市场低迷，导致银行在最近季度的盈利中进行了减记，汇丰银行 (HSBA.L) 已做好准备，应对中国房地产进一步亏损。

Quinn reiterated that he felt the China property market had bottomed out, but said collateral consequences would potentially cause further losses for some banks.翻译:奎因重申，他认为中国房地产市场已经触底，但他表示，附带后果可能会给一些银行带来进一步损失。

"We feel as though we're well provisioned," Quinn told the Financial Times' Global Banking Summit event in London.翻译:奎因在伦敦举行的英国《金融时报》全球银行峰会活动中表示：“我们感觉自己已经做好了准备。”

The HSBC CEO also said he did not take a "burner phone" into Hong Kong, where thousands of the lender's employees and clients are based, following media reports that some Western firms had encouraged staff to do so in view of escalating security concerns.翻译:汇丰银行首席执行官还表示，他没有携带“一次性手机”进入香港，该银行的数千名员工和客户都驻扎在香港，此前有媒体报道称，鉴于安全问题不断升级，一些西方公司鼓励员工这样做。

Quinn said he took two phones, two iPads and a laptop into Hong Kong and mainland China, but said the number of devices reflected splitting business and personal devices.翻译:奎因表示，他携带两部手机、两台 iPad 和一台笔记本电脑进入香港和中国大陆，但他表示，设备数量反映了商务设备和个人设备的情况。

item.title: 具有里程碑意义的香港国家安全案预计将在3至4个月内判决 - 法官
item.description:
A landmark national security trial for 16 Hong Kong democracy activists entered its final stretch on Wednesday, with a verdict expected in early 2024, over two years after they were charged with conspiracy to commit subversion.翻译:对 16 名香港民主活动人士进行的具有里程碑意义的国家安全审判于周三进入最后阶段，预计将于 2024 年初作出判决，距离他们被指控串谋颠覆已有两年多。

On the first day of closing submissions, one of the national security judges, Andrew Chan, said a verdict would "tentatively" come in three to four months, with 10 days set aside for closing submissions.翻译:在结案陈词的第一天，国家安全法官之一安德鲁·陈 (Andrew Chan) 表示，判决将“暂定”在三到四个月内做出，其中有 10 天的时间用于结案陈词。

This is the first official indication of a potential end point for the legal proceedings, which have already stretched over 100 days in court since the trial began on Feb. 6.翻译:这是该法律诉讼程序可能结束的首次正式迹象，自 2 月 6 日审判开始以来，该诉讼程序已经在法庭上持续了 100 多天。

The legal saga began with police raids on more than 50 of the city's leading democrats in early 2021 under a sweeping China-imposed national security law. Some Western governments, including the United States, have criticised the law as a tool of repression.翻译:这场法律传奇始于 2021 年初，根据中国实施的一项全面的国家安全法，警方突袭了该市 50 多名民主党领袖。包括美国在内的一些西方政府批评该法律是镇压工具。

Beijing says the national security law brought stability to the city after months long pro-democracy protests in 2019.翻译:北京表示，在 2019 年持续数月的民主抗议活动之后，国家安全法给这座城市带来了稳定。

The court case could see many leading democrats jailed for life.翻译:该法庭案件可能导致许多民主党领袖被判终身监禁。

Throughout the trial, government prosecutors have accused the democrats of hatching a conspiracy to cause a constitutional crisis and to subvert the authorities by unlawful means.翻译:在整个审判过程中，政府检察官指控民主党策划阴谋引发宪法危机，并以非法手段颠覆当局。

The prosecutors alleged that after organising a primary election aimed at maximising the democratic opposition's chances of a majority in the legislature, the democrats would then seek to "indiscriminately veto" government budgets to push the government to respond to the demands of democratic protesters.翻译:检察官声称，在组织旨在最大限度地提高民主反对派在立法机构获得多数席位的机会的初选后，民主党将寻求“不加区别地否决”政府预算，以迫使政府回应民主抗议者的要求。

The aim was to subvert state power, or force Hong Kong's leader to resign, the prosecutors said.翻译:检察官表示，其目的是颠覆国家政权，或迫使香港领导人辞职。

During the closing submission, prosecutor Jonathan Man argued that it was quite clear that acts of subversion had taken place, even without actual violence.翻译:在结案陈词中，检察官乔纳森·曼 (Jonathan Man) 辩称，即使没有实际的暴力，也很明显发生了颠覆行为。

"Nowadays physical violence would not be necessary," to carry out subversion, Man told the court, saying such acts were often carried out through digital means including social media.翻译:曼告诉法庭，“如今，身体暴力不再是必要的”，以进行颠覆，并表示此类行为通常是通过包括社交媒体在内的数字手段进行的。

"Communication with the public is much easier, (it's) easy to manipulate those means in order to endanger national security," he added.翻译:他补充说：“与公众的沟通更加容易，很容易操纵这些手段来危害国家安全。”

Some defence lawyers argued, however, in their closing submissions that the right to veto a budget is allowed for under the city's mini constitution, the Basic Law.翻译:然而，一些辩护律师在结案陈词中辩称，香港的小宪法《基本法》允许否决预算的权利。

Most of the democrats have been detained for more than 1,000 days since Feb. 28, 2021, on national security grounds, and were subjected to marathon bail hearings. The case has been repeatedly delayed as prosecutors requested more time to prepare. Only 13 of the original 47 democrats were granted bail.翻译:自2021年2月28日以来，大多数民主党人以国家安全为由被拘留超过1000天，并接受了马拉松式的保释听证会。由于检察官要求更多时间准备，此案一再被推迟。最初的 47 名民主党人中只有 13 人获准保释。

Thirty-one of the 47 charged have pleaded guilty - which could qualify them for reduced sentences. Only 16 are not pleading guilty, including former journalist Gwyneth Ho; activists Owen Chow and Gordon Ng; and ex-democratic lawmakers Leung Kwok-hung, Lam Cheuk-ting and Helena Wong.翻译:47 名被指控的人中有 31 人已认罪，这可能使他们有资格获得减刑。只有 16 人没有认罪，其中包括前记者 Gwyneth Ho；活动家 Owen Chow 和 Gordon Ng；以及前民主派议员梁国雄、林卓婷和黄海伦。

Those who have pleaded guilty include former law professor Benny Tai and activist Joshua Wong, who will be sentenced after the trial. Four who pleaded guilty have become prosecution witnesses.翻译:已认罪的人包括前法学教授戴耀廷和活动人士黄之锋，他们将在审判后被判刑。四名认罪者已成为控方证人。

item.title: 政策措施出台后，中国新房价格今年将攀升
item.description:
Summary:
  • New home prices will likely rise in 2024
  • Property sales, investment seen continuing to slide next year
翻译:概括：
  • 2024年新房价格可能上涨
  • 明年房地产销售和投资预计将继续下滑

Prices of new homes in China are now expected to climb 3% this year after a slew of policy measures to support the country's beleaguered property market, up from earlier expectations for prices to be flat, a Reuters poll showed.翻译:路透调查显示，在采取一系列政策措施支持中国陷入困境的房地产市场后，中国新房价格预计今年将上涨 3%，高于此前价格持平的预期。

But the poll of 11 economists, conducted Nov. 20-28, also showed expectations for 1% growth in new home prices in 2024 were little changed from an August poll. Economists said more measures from authorities are needed.翻译:但 11 月 20 日至 28 日对 11 名经济学家进行的民意调查也显示，对 2024 年新房价格增长 1% 的预期与 8 月的民意调查相比几乎没有变化。经济学家表示，当局需要采取更多措施。

Defaults on debt payments by many developers in China's cash-squeezed and highly indebted property sector have sparked fears of a broader financial crisis, weighed on consumer confidence and hindered economic growth.翻译:中国现金紧张且负债累累的房地产行业许多开发商拖欠债务，引发了人们对更广泛的金融危机的担忧，打压了消费者信心并阻碍了经济增长。

Authorities, particularly those in major cities, have embarked on a string of steps to bolster demand, including allowing smaller down payments, easing curbs on home buying such as the number of homes that can be bought, lowering borrowing costs and encouraging the extension of loans.翻译:当局，特别是大城市的当局，已采取一系列措施来提振需求，包括允许减少首付、放宽对购房的限制（例如可购买的房屋数量）、降低借贷成本以及鼓励延长贷款期限。

But most analysts believe these actions must be complemented by stronger fiscal and monetary action.翻译:但大多数分析师认为，这些行动必须辅之以更强有力的财政和货币行动。

"There is still room for easing property policies in major cities in 2024 ... The market in first and second tier cities will continue to outperform third and fourth cities next year, " said Huang Yu, an analyst at real estate research firm China Index Academy.翻译:房地产研究公司中国指数分析师黄宇表示，“2024年主要城市房地产政策仍有宽松空间……明年一二线城市市场将继续跑赢三四线城市”学院。

Estimates for home unit sales for 2023 were revised down to an 8% slide compared with predictions of a 5% drop in August, the poll also showed. Economists also expect declines next year, predicting a 5% fall.翻译:民意调查还显示，与 8 月份预测的下降 5% 相比，2023 年房屋销售预期下调至 8%。经济学家还预计明年将出现下降，预计下降 5%。

"The key reason is that homebuyer confidence has not yet been fully rebuilt," said Wang Xingping, a senior analyst at Fitch Bohua.翻译:惠誉博华高级分析师王兴平表示：“关键原因是购房者信心尚未完全重建。”

According to the poll, property investment is expected to slump 10% in 2023 and then 8.4% in 2024.翻译:调查显示，预计 2023 年房地产投资将下降 10%，2024 年将下降 8.4%。

Regulators are drafting a list of 50 property developers eligible for a range of financing support, including Country Garden (2007.HK) and state-backed China Vanke (000002.SZ), Bloomberg reported last week.翻译:据彭博社上周报道，监管机构正在起草一份有资格获得一系列融资支持的 50 家房地产开发商名单，其中包括碧桂园(2007.HK)和国家支持的万科(000002.SZ) 。

(For other stories from the Reuters quarterly housing market polls)翻译:（有关路透社季度房地产市场民意调查的其他报道）

Reporting by Liangping Gao and Ryan Woo; Editing by翻译:高亮平、吴瑞安报道；编辑者

item.title: 中国安排日本官员探视被拘留的日本公民
item.description:
China has arranged for Japanese embassy officials to visit a Japanese citizen detained on suspicion of espionage, China's foreign ministry said on Wednesday, after the arrest dealt an outsized blow to the two countries' close economic ties.翻译:中国外交部周三表示，中国已安排日本大使馆官员探视一名因涉嫌间谍活动而被拘留的日本公民，此前这名公民的逮捕对两国密切的经济关系造成了巨大打击。

Japan said late in October China had formally arrested a Japanese businessman detained in March on suspicion of spying.翻译:日本表示，10月底，中国正式逮捕了一名3月份因涉嫌从事间谍活动而被拘留的日本商人。

In a meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping earlier in November, Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida sought the swift release of the man.翻译:在 11 月初与中国国家主席习近平会面时，日本首相岸田文雄寻求迅速释放该男子。

Japanese Ambassador to China Hideo Tarumi on Tuesday met for the first time the senior Astellas Pharma (4503.T) employee arrested last month on suspicion of espionage, Kyodo News reported, citing a Japanese government official.翻译:据日本共同社援引日本政府官员的消息报道，日本驻华大使垂海英夫周二首次会见了上个月因涉嫌间谍活动而被捕的安斯泰来制药(4503.T)高级员工。

"The Chinese side has arranged officials of the Japanese embassy in China to conduct a consular visit for relevant parties," said Wang Wenbin, a spokesperson at the Chinese foreign ministry.翻译:中国外交部发言人汪文斌表示，中方已安排日本驻华使馆官员对有关方面进行领事探访。

"China, as a country under the rule of law, has handled the case in accordance with law and protects the legitimate rights and interests of the person concerned," Wang said at a regular news conference, without identifying the Japanese citizen.翻译:王在例行新闻发布会上说：“中国作为法治国家，依法处理此案，保护当事人的合法权益。”但他没有透露这名日本公民的身份。

The Japanese business executive has been named in several media reports as Hiroshi Nishiyama.翻译:多家媒体报道称这位日本企业高管为西山浩 (Hiroshi Nishiyama)。

The arrest of the well-connected veteran of the Japanese community in China has had a considerable chilling effect on business ties, some Tokyo officials have said.翻译:一些东京官员表示，这名在中国日本人社区中人脉广泛的资深人士被捕，对商业关系产生了相当大的寒蝉效应。

The Chinese foreign ministry previously said China had always supported China-Japan trade and economic cooperation, and had provided a good environment for the lawful operation of Japanese companies in China and their employees.翻译:中国外交部此前表示，中方一贯支持中日经贸合作，为日本企业及其员工在华合法经营提供良好环境。

Five Japanese nationals are currently detained in China, with a total of 17 detained since 2015, a year after China introduced an anti-espionage law for the first time, according to Japan's foreign ministry.翻译:日本外务省表示，目前有 5 名日本公民被拘留在中国，自 2015 年（中国首次出台反间谍法一年后）以来，共有 17 人被拘留。

Under the law, Chinese authorities can clamp down on activities they consider as threats to national security. The law was expanded in July this year to include the leak of any documents, data and information related to national security.翻译:根据该法律，中国当局可以打击他们认为威胁国家安全的活动。该法于今年 7 月进行了扩展，将泄露与国家安全相关的任何文件、数据和信息纳入其中。

Reporting by Ryan Woo and Ethan Wang Editing by Bernadette Baum翻译:Ryan Woo 和 Ethan Wang 报道 Bernadette Baum 编辑

item.title: 印度4月至10月从中国的钢铁进口量创四年新高
item.description:
India's finished steel imports from China touched a four-year high in the first seven months of the fiscal year that began in April, according to provisional government data reviewed by Reuters on Wednesday.翻译:路透社周三查阅的临时政府数据显示，在 4 月份开始的本财年的前 7 个月里，印度从中国的成品钢材进口量创下了四年来的新高。

China was the top exporter of finished steel to India during April-October, shipping in 1.1 million metric tons of the alloy, up 47.3% on the year.翻译:4月至10月，中国是印度最大的成品钢材出口国，出口了110万吨合金，同比增长47.3%。

China, the world's top steel producer, exported mostly cold-rolled coil or sheets to India, followed by hot-rolled coil products, plates, and pipes, among others.翻译:中国是世界最大的钢铁生产国，主要向印度出口冷轧卷材或板材，其次是热轧卷材产品、板材和管材等。

The Indian steel industry has sought government intervention through safeguards against Chinese imports.翻译:印度钢铁行业寻求政府干预，通过对中国进口产品采取保障措施。

During April-October, India imported a total of 3.5 million metric tons of finished steel, up 10.1% from a year earlier. Overall imports were also at a four-year high, data showed.翻译:4月至10月，印度共进口成品钢材350万吨，同比增长10.1%。数据显示，总体进口量也创四年来新高。

Earlier this month, India's federal steel secretary flagged rising imports as a concern.翻译:本月早些时候，印度联邦钢铁部长表示进口增长令人担忧。

South Korea was the second-biggest exporter of finished steel to India during April-October, shipping 1.1 million metric tons.翻译:4月至10月期间，韩国是印度第二大成品钢材出口国，出口量为110万吨。

However, India remained a net exporter of finished steel during April-October, with 3.5 million metric tons sold to buyers such as Italy, Spain, Belgium, Nepal and the UAE, government data showed.翻译:然而，政府数据显示，4月至10月印度仍然是成品钢材净出口国，向意大利、西班牙、比利时、尼泊尔和阿联酋等买家出售了350万吨钢材。

Hot-rolled coils and strips were the most exported products, according to the data.翻译:数据显示，热轧卷材和带材是出口最多的产品。

India's crude steel output stood at 82.2 million tons in the April-October period, up 15% from last year. India is the world's second-biggest crude steel producer.翻译:4-10月印度粗钢产量为8220万吨，同比增长15%。印度是世界第二大粗钢生产国。

Domestic consumption of finished steel was 75.8 million tons, up 15% on the year.翻译:国内成品钢材消费量7580万吨，同比增长15%。

item.title: 斯里兰卡与债权国达成债务重组协议——政府消息人士
item.description:
Sri Lanka has been informed that a debt-restructuring agreement with creditor nations has been reached but is yet to receive a letter of confirmation from the official creditor committee, a government source told Reuters on Wednesday.翻译:一位政府消息人士周三告诉路透社，斯里兰卡已获悉已与债权国达成债务重组协议，但尚未收到官方债权人委员会的确认函。

Sri Lanka, mired in its worst financial crisis in decades, has been trying to reach restructuring deals with creditors since last year, having being forced to default on its foreign debt in May 2022 after its foreign exchange reserves dwindled to record lows.翻译:斯里兰卡深陷数十年来最严重的金融危机，自去年以来一直试图与债权人达成重组协议，2022年5月，其外汇储备减少至历史低点后被迫外债违约。

"Sri Lanka has been informed of an agreement," the source, who did not want to be identified, said. "It is confirmed that an agreement has been reached with bilateral lenders but we are still waiting on an official letter. We expect it soon."翻译:“斯里兰卡已获悉已达成协议，”这位不愿透露姓名的消息人士表示。 “已确认已与双边贷款机构达成协议，但我们仍在等待正式信函。我们预计很快就会收到。”

The Sri Lanka president's office and the finance ministry did not immediately respond to requests for comment.翻译:斯里兰卡总统办公室和财政部没有立即回应置评请求。

Japan co-chairs the official creditor committee, together with France and India. China is Sri Lanka's largest bilateral creditor and is an observer in the group, steering clear of joining the group as a formal member.翻译:日本与法国和印度共同担任官方债权人委员会主席。中国是斯里兰卡最大的双边债权国，也是该组织的观察员，但并未以正式成员身份加入该组织。

There was no immediate reaction from the bilateral creditors.翻译:双边债权人没有立即做出反应。

The agreement comes about a month after the heavily indebted island nation reached a deal with the Export-Import Bank of China (EXIM) covering about $4.2 billion of outstanding debt.翻译:该协议是在这个负债累累的岛国与中国进出口银行（EXIM）达成协议一个月后达成的，该协议涵盖了约42亿美元的未偿债务。

The EXIM deal will help Sri Lanka clear the first review of an International Monetary Fund (MF) bailout, and secure a second IMF funding tranche of about $334 million, the finance ministry has said.翻译:财政部表示，EXIM 协议将帮助斯里兰卡通过国际货币基金组织 (MF) 救助的首次审查，并获得国际货币基金组织 (IMF) 约 3.34 亿美元的第二笔资金。

After receiving IMF approval, Sri Lanka could get further funds from the Asian Development Bank and the World Bank, bringing the total funding to around $900 million, central bank Governor P. Nandalal Weerasinghe said last week.翻译:斯里兰卡央行行长 P. Nandalal Weerasinghe 上周表示，在获得国际货币基金组织批准后，斯里兰卡可以从亚洲开发银行和世界银行获得更多资金，使资金总额达到约 9 亿美元。

ADB could provide $200 million as early as next month, the lender's country director, Takafumi Kadono, told a forum in Colombo on Wednesday. The ADB's funds are part of a $350 million special policy-based loan that was approved in May to support Sri Lanka.翻译:周三，亚行国家主任角野贵文在科伦坡的一个论坛上表示，亚行最早可能在下个月提供 2 亿美元。亚行的资金是5月份批准用于支持斯里兰卡的3.5亿美元特别政策贷款的一部分。

Sri Lanka's total external debt is estimated at $36.6 billion, which includes $10.94 billion of bilateral debt, according to latest data released by its finance ministry.翻译:根据斯里兰卡财政部公布的最新数据，斯里兰卡外债总额估计为366亿美元，其中双边债务为109.4亿美元。

The country also needs to reach an agreement with bondholders who hold the bulk of the island's $12.5 billion worth of international sovereign bonds.翻译:该国还需要与持有该岛价值 125 亿美元国际主权债券大部分的债券持有人达成协议。

Sri Lanka's dollar bond maturing in July 2026 was last up 0.44 cents at 50.50 cents, according to Tradeweb data.翻译:根据 Tradeweb 数据，斯里兰卡于 2026 年 7 月到期的美元债券最后上涨 0.44 美分，至 50.50 美分。

Writing by Sudipto Ganguly; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Kim Coghill翻译:苏迪普托·甘古利 (Sudipto Ganguly) 撰写；编辑：Jacqueline Wong 和 Kim Coghill

item.title: 在中国和俄罗斯遭受痛苦之后，投资者窥探廉价芬兰股票的价值
item.description:
Summary:
  • Finnish industrials premium at 14-year low
  • NATO membership has reduced Russia risk
  • OMX Helsinki 25 down 10% in 2023 vs 8% rally for STOXX 600
翻译:概括：
  • 芬兰工业溢价创14年新低
  • 加入北约降低了俄罗斯的风险
  • OMX 赫尔辛基 25 指数 2023 年下跌 10%，而 STOXX 600 指数则上涨 8%

Finland's beaten-down stock market may offer value for investors next year, money managers say, with a potential global economic recovery set to lift the cyclical stocks that dominate the index and NATO membership easing perceived Russia risks.翻译:基金经理表示，芬兰遭受重创的股市明年可能会为投资者带来价值，全球经济潜在复苏将提振主导该指数的周期性股票，而北约成员国身份也将缓解俄罗斯面临的风险。

Finnish stocks are Europe's biggest laggards this year, as risks stemming from tensions with Russia and concerns over China's stuttering recovery have hurt its exporters. In addition, big funds have favoured global mega caps over smaller firms, which make up a large portion of the Nordic country's equity landscape.翻译:芬兰股市是今年欧洲股市中表现最差的，因为与俄罗斯的紧张关系带来的风险以及对中国复苏乏力的担忧损害了其出口商。此外，大型基金更青睐全球大型企业而不是小型企业，而小型企业在北欧国家的股票格局中占很大一部分。

The top 25 stocks in Helsinki are worth a combined $150 billion. Europe's most valuable firm Novo Nordisk (NOVOb.CO), alone, is worth three times that. The OMX Helsinki 25 (.OMXH25) has lost 10% this year, versus the STOXX 600's (.STOXX) 8% rally.翻译:赫尔辛基排名前 25 的股票总价值达 1,500 亿美元。仅欧洲市值最高的公司诺和诺德公司(NOVOb.CO)的市值就达到了这个数字的三倍。 OMX 赫尔辛基 25 指数(.OMXH25)今年下跌了 10%，而 STOXX 600 (.STOXX)则上涨了 8%。

Tomas Hildebrandt, senior portfolio manager at Nordic fund manager EVLI, sees Finnish stocks as cheaply valued and likely to benefit from an economic recovery he expects could gain traction in 2024.翻译:北欧基金管理公司 EVLI 的高级投资组合经理托马斯·希尔德布兰特 (Tomas Hildebrandt) 认为，芬兰股票估值低廉，并可能受益于经济复苏，他预计 2024 年经济复苏可能会获得牵引力。

"I don't see any structural issues at the moment that would really spin the global economy into a deeper recession. Hence, I think that the bottom will be reached at some point," said Hilderbrant, who is overweight Finland, but underweight Europe.翻译:希尔德布兰特表示，“目前我认为没有任何结构性问题会真正让全球经济陷入更严重的衰退。因此，我认为在某个时候会触底。”希尔德布兰特增持芬兰，但减持欧洲。 。

"We might be early in our call, but with the outlook of a shallow recession, markets will start to look for a cyclical recovery sometime during next year".

GLOBAL DOWNTURN

Industrial stocks have suffered from a global manufacturing downturn that started in 2022 (XWPMIM=ECI). A recent Deutsche Bank study, however, showed some leading indicators -- like South Korean semiconductor exports, which rose in October for the first time in 16 months -- are pointing upwards.翻译:工业股受到 2022 年开始的全球制造业低迷的影响(XWPMIM=ECI) 。然而，德意志银行最近的一项研究显示，一些领先指标（例如 10 月份韩国半导体出口 16 个月来首次增长）正在上升。

A recovery should benefit other export-driven markets in Europe, although Finnish equities look more of a bargain. They suffered a harsher derating due to their greater exposure to China and selling linked to concerns over tensions with Russia.翻译:尽管芬兰股市看起来更便宜，但复苏应该有利于欧洲其他出口驱动型市场。由于对中国的敞口加大以及对与俄罗斯紧张关系的担忧导致抛售，它们的评级遭受了更严重的下调。

In April, Finland joined NATO, ending seven decades of military non-alignment and roughly doubling the length of the border the organisation shares with Russia.翻译:4月，芬兰加入北约，结束了长达七年的军事不结盟状态，并将该组织与俄罗斯的边界长度大致增加了一倍。

"Some foreign investors have been selling Finnish stocks after the Ukraine war started due to Russian proximity, but the country risk has declined after Finland joined NATO," said Hertta Alava, senior strategist at the country's top bank Nordea.翻译:芬兰最大银行北欧联合银行高级策略师赫塔·阿拉瓦表示，“乌克兰战争爆发后，由于靠近俄罗斯，一些外国投资者一直在抛售芬兰股票，但芬兰加入北约后，该国风险有所下降。”

Elevator maker Kone (KNEBV.HE), Helsinki's biggest industrial stock, sold its Russian assets in October, 20 months after Russia invaded Ukraine. It has struggled because of its large exposure to China's property sector.翻译:赫尔辛基最大的工业股票电梯制造商通力(KNEBV.HE)在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰 20 个月后，于 10 月份出售了其俄罗斯资产。由于其在中国房地产行业的投资规模较大，该公司一直在苦苦挣扎。

Kone's update to end-September saw orders falling less than expected thanks to what CEO Henrik Ehrnrooth called a "fantastic quarter" in China. Following a 14% slide this year, the stock is 10% cheaper than rivals Zurich-listed Schindler (SCHP.S) and Otis (OTIS.N) in the U.S., having traded at a premium of around the same size to both in the last 5 years, according to LSEG data.翻译:通力截至 9 月底的最新数据显示，由于首席执行官 Henrik Ehrnrooth 所说的中国“出色的季度”，订单下降幅度低于预期。继今年下跌 14% 后，该股比在苏黎世上市的迅达(SCHP.S)和美国奥的斯(OTIS.N)的竞争对手便宜 10%，其交易价格与这两家公司在美国的溢价大致相同。根据 LSEG 数据，过去 5 年。

Other underperformers include cyclical material companies such as forestry firms Metsa Board (METSB.HE) and Stora Enso (STERV.HE), and stainless steelmaker Outokumpu (OUT1V.HE).

"A LOT IS PRICED IN"

Finnish industrials (.dMIFI0IN00PUS) have commanded an average premium of 28% over European peers (.MIEU0IN00PEU) in the last decade. That gap has narrowed to a 14-year low of 6%, LSEG data shows.翻译:过去十年，芬兰工业股(.dMIFI0IN00PUS) 的平均溢价比欧洲同行(.MIEU0IN00PEU)高出 28%。 LSEG 数据显示，这一差距已缩小至 6%，为 14 年来的最低点。

Nordea's Alava said this group had potential to outperform Swedish and French industrials over the next two years, while the broader Finnish market had stronger earnings upside.翻译:北欧联合银行的阿拉瓦表示，该集团有潜力在未来两年超越瑞典和法国工业企业，而更广泛的芬兰市场的盈利上涨空间也更大。

According to LSEG, OMX Helsinki 25 earnings are seen growing 12% in 2024, faster than the 6.7% rise seen for the STOXX, after falling 16% and 1.2% respectively this year.翻译:根据 LSEG 的数据，OMX Helsinki 25 的盈利预计在 2024 年增长 12%，高于 STOXX 6.7% 的涨幅，而今年分别下跌 16% 和 1.2%。

"Finnish stocks are attractively valued and a lot of bad news is priced in," Alava said.翻译:阿拉瓦表示：“芬兰股市估值颇具吸引力，许多坏消息已被消化。”

"If the European economy recovers in 2024 as I expect, Finnish cyclical stocks should recover too... this could be a good time for long-term investors to increase holdings".翻译:“如果欧洲经济如我预期的那样在2024年复苏，芬兰周期性股票也应该复苏……这可能是长期投资者增持的好时机”。

Reporting by Danilo Masoni; Editing by Christina Fincher翻译:达尼洛·马索尼 (Danilo Masoni) 报道；克里斯蒂娜·芬奇编辑

item.title: 中国蔚来汽车与吉利汽车电池交换合作
item.description:
Chinese automakers Nio (9866.HK) and Zhejiang Geely Holding Group said on Wednesday they had signed a strategic partnership agreement on battery swapping that would see them work together on standards, technology and model development.翻译:中国汽车制造商蔚来汽车（9866.HK）和浙江吉利控股集团周三表示，双方已签署换电战略合作协议，双方将在标准、技术和车型开发方面展开合作。

The deal makes Geely (GEELY.UL), whose brands range from Volvo to Zeekr, the second automaker to sign a battery swapping partnership with Chinese electric vehicle maker Nio.翻译:该交易使得吉利（GEELY.UL）（其品牌包括沃尔沃和Zeekr）成为第二家与中国电动汽车制造商蔚来签署电池更换合作伙伴关系的汽车制造商。

Nio, which has been looking to lower costs, announced a tie-up with Changan Automobile (000625.SZ) last week.翻译:一直寻求降低成本的蔚来汽车上周宣布与长安汽车（000625.SZ） 合作。

Battery swapping allows drivers to replace depleted packs quickly with fully charged packs, rather than plugging the vehicle into a charging point.翻译:电池更换允许驾驶员用充满电的电池组快速更换耗尽的电池组，而不是将车辆插入充电点。

Geely and Nio will adopt a "co-investment, co-construction, shared, co-operative" model, the companies said.翻译:双方表示，吉利与蔚来将采取“共投、共建、共享、合作”的模式。

They will look to establish an efficient battery asset management mechanism, build a unified battery swap operation and develop battery swappable vehicles compatible with each other's battery swap systems, the companies added.翻译:双方将建立高效的电池资产管理机制，建立统一的换电运营体系，开发与彼此换电系统兼容的换电汽车。

Nio has been looking to improve profitability. It has trimmed its workforce and deferred long-term investments to improve efficiency and reduce costs in the face of growing competition since U.S. auto maker Tesla (TSLA.O) kicked off a price war at the start of the year.翻译:蔚来一直在寻求提高盈利能力。自美国汽车制造商特斯拉(TSLA.O)年初掀起价格战以来，面对日益激烈的竞争，该公司已裁员并推迟长期投资，以提高效率并降低成本。

Battery swapping could ease the strain on power grids at peak times when drivers recharge, but industry analysts and executives expect it would only become feasible if batteries become more standardised.翻译:电池更换可以缓解司机充电高峰时段电网的压力，但行业分析师和高管预计，只有电池变得更加标准化，这才变得可行。

Nio, with a plan to nearly double the total number of such stations in China this year, is one of a handful of EV makers betting on battery swapping as a major power option for EVs.翻译:蔚来汽车计划今年将中国此类充电站的总数增加近一倍，是少数押注电池更换作为电动汽车主要动力选择的电动汽车制造商之一。

In 2021, Geely said it aimed to set up 5,000 battery swapping stations for EVs globally by 2025.翻译:2021年，吉利表示，目标是到2025年在全球建立5000个电动汽车电池更换站。

Geely said it currently had 300 stations in operation and it would now continue to build stations alone as well as jointly with Nio.翻译:吉利表示，目前已运营 300 个加油站，并将继续单独以及与蔚来联合建设加油站。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom and Brenda Goh; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Jamie Freed翻译:北京新闻编辑室和Brenda Goh报道；编辑：杰奎琳·黄和杰米·弗里德

item.title: 中国最高外交官王毅将于周四访问越南 - 消息人士
item.description:
China's top diplomat Wang Yi will visit Vietnam from Thursday, two Vietnamese sources with knowledge of trip said on Wednesday.翻译:两名越南消息人士周三表示，中国最高外交官王毅将从周四开始访问越南。

"He is expected to attend a Vietnam-China inter-government meeting in Hanoi on Friday," one of the sources said.翻译:一位消息人士称：“预计他将于周五出席在河内举行的越南-中国政府间会议。”

Vietnam's and China's foreign ministries did not immediately respond to a requests for comment.翻译:越南和中国外交部没有立即回应置评请求。

China has had traditionally strong ties with Vietnam since diplomatic relations were established in 1950, despite a brief war in 1979.翻译:自 1950 年建交以来，中国与越南传统上一直保持着牢固的关系，尽管 1979 年发生了短暂的战争。

China is Vietnam's largest trading partner and a vital source of imports for its manufacturing sector.翻译:中国是越南最大的贸易伙伴，也是越南制造业的重要进口来源地。

China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao on Monday during a visit to Vietnam pledged to further open the Chinese market to Vietnamese agricultural products as the two countries seek to deepen trade ties, according to Vietnam's Ministry of Industry and Trade.翻译:据越南工贸部称，中国商务部部长王文涛周一在访问越南期间承诺，随着两国寻求深化贸易关系，将进一步向越南农产品开放中国市场。

Reuters last month reported that Vietnamese and Chinese officials were preparing for a possible trip by Chinese President Xi Jinping to Hanoi. At the time, plans were for the trip to take place at the end of October or in early November. Three Hanoi-based diplomats subsequently said the visit was likely to be postponed to December.翻译:路透社上个月报道称，越南和中国官员正在为中国国家主席习近平可能访问河内做准备。当时计划在十月底或十一月初进行这次旅行。三名驻河内外交官随后表示，此次访问可能会推迟到 12 月。

Bilateral trade between Vietnam and China rose 5.5% last year to $175.5 billion, with shipments from China to Vietnam accounting for 67%, according to the ministry.翻译:据越南商务部称，去年越南和中国的双边贸易增长了5.5%，达到1755亿美元，其中中国对越南的出口额占67%。

Reporting by Hanoi bureau, additional reporting by Ryan Woo in Beijing; Editing by Kanupriya Kapoor翻译:河内分社报道，北京吴瑞安补充报道；卡努普里亚·卡普尔 编辑

item.title: 中国11月份工厂活动可能连续第二个月收缩
item.description:
China's manufacturing activity likely contracted for a second consecutive month in November, a Reuters poll showed on Wednesday, keeping alive calls for further stimulus measures as factory owners struggle for orders both at home and abroad.翻译:路透社周三的一项民意调查显示，中国11月份制造业活动可能连续第二个月萎缩，在工厂主努力争取国内外订单之际，要求采取进一步刺激措施的呼声依然高涨。

While the official purchasing managers' index (PMI) is expected to have improved to 49.7 in November from last month's unexpected drop to 49.5, the median forecast of 31 economists in a Reuters poll has the index staying below the 50-point level demarcating contraction from expansion.翻译:虽然官方采购经理人指数 (PMI) 预计 11 月将从上个月意外下降的 49.5 改善至 49.7，但路透调查中 31 名经济学家的预测中值显示，该指数仍低于 50 点的水平，标志着经济萎缩。扩张。

Economists appear in agreement that the economy is still largely struggling for traction despite some signs of green shoots in mixed October data, with all respondents returning readings between 49.0 and 50.2 and the vast majority predicting a small contraction of between 49.6 and 49.8.翻译:经济学家们似乎一致认为，尽管 10 月份混合数据出现了一些复苏迹象，但经济在很大程度上仍难以获得牵引力，所有受访者的读数都在 49.0 至 50.2 之间，绝大多数人预测将出现小幅收缩，在 49.6 至 49.8 之间。

The world's second-largest economy has been unable to mount a strong post-COVID recovery this year as a deep crisis in the property market, local government debt risks, slow global growth and geopolitical tensions dented momentum.翻译:由于房地产市场的深度危机、地方政府债务风险、全球经济增长缓慢和地缘政治紧张局势削弱了经济增长势头，全球第二大经济体今年未能在疫情后实现强劲复苏。

A flurry of policy support measures has had only a modest effect, raising pressure on authorities to roll out more stimulus.翻译:一系列政策支持措施收效甚微，加大了当局推出更多刺激措施的压力。

Profit growth at China's industrial firms shrank back to the low single digits last month, following an 11.9% increase in September and a 17.2% gain in August, which analysts attributed to volatile input costs. Both new export and import orders shrank in October.翻译:继9月份增长11.9%和8月份增长17.2%之后，中国工业企业利润增速上个月回落至低个位数，分析师将其归因于投入成本波动。 10月份新出口和进口订单均出现萎缩。

The sputtering recovery has prompted many analysts to warn that China may begin flirting with Japan-style stagnation later this decade unless policymakers take steps to reorientate the economy towards household consumption and market-allocation of resources.翻译:缓慢的复苏促使许多分析师警告称，除非政策制定者采取措施将经济重新定位为家庭消费和资源市场配置，否则中国可能会在本十年晚些时候开始陷入日本式的停滞。

China's central bank governor said on Tuesday he was "confident that China will enjoy healthy and sustainable growth in 2024 and beyond," but urged structural reforms to reduce reliance on infrastructure and property for growth.翻译:中国央行行长周二表示，他“相信中国将在2024年及以后实现健康、可持续的增长”，但敦促进行结构性改革，减少增长对基础设施和房地产的依赖。

Policy advisers say the government will need to implement further stimulus should it wish to sustain an annual economic growth target of 'around 5%' next year, which would match this year's goal.翻译:政策顾问表示，如果政府希望明年维持“5%左右”的年度经济增长目标（这将与今年的目标相匹配），那么政府将需要实施进一步的刺激措施。

The official PMI will be released on Thursday. The private Caixin factory survey will be issued on Friday, and analysts expect its reading to edge up to 49.8 from 49.5 in October.翻译:官方采购经理人指数将于周四发布。私营财新工厂调查将于周五发布，分析师预计其读数将从 10 月份的 49.5 升至 49.8。
